thread.title: BRIEF-DMG Blockchain Announces Acquisition Of Blockseer

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-DMG Blockchain Announces Acquisition Of Blockseer
text: 30 PM / in 12 minutes BRIEF-DMG Blockchain Announces Acquisition Of Blockseer Reuters Staff Feb 13 (Reuters) - DMG Blockchain Solutions Inc: * DMG BLOCKCHAIN ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF BLOCKSEER * SAYS ‍DMG, THROUGH ITS U.S. UNIT WILL ACQUIRE BLOCKSEER FOR PURCHASE PRICE COMPRISING C$2.6 MILLION CASH & UP TO 7.7 MILLION DMG​ SHARES * SAYS DEAL FOR ‍MAXIMUM TRANSACTION VALUE OF C$16 MILLION * SAYS CO‘S U.S. SUBSIDIARY WILL ACQUIRE ALL OF ISSUED AND OUTSTANDING SECURITIES OF DATIENT INC, DOING BUSINESS AS “BLOCKSEER” * SAYS IN CONNECTION WITH DEAL, ‍DANNY YANG APPOINTED AS DMG CTO; SHELDON BENNETT APPOINTED AS COO, WILL ALSO REMAIN AS DIRECTOR OF DMG​ * SAYS POST DEAL, DMG-US WILL OWN 100% OF BLOCKSEER WITH DMG-US SHARES BEING OWNED ABOUT 61% BY CO & ABOUT 39% BY BLOCKSEER SELLING SECURITYHOLDERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
